messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: Operation Green Falcon DATE: 05/17/44  Local communities have reported a series of illegal logging activities within the national forest reserve. Satellite imagery confirms the clear-cutting of several acres, leading to loss of biodiversity and affecting indigenous tribes.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  ENVIRONMENTAL CRIMES LEAD: Captain A. D. Watson leads the task force to protect the national forest reserve and investigate the illegal activities. SURVEILLANCE: Detectives B. E. Quinn and C. F. Schultz deploy drones to monitor logging activities and gather evidence. INTELLIGENCE: Detectives G. H. Torres and I. J. Vega analyze purchase records of heavy machinery and link them to suspected logging companies. PATROL: Patrol Officers K. L. Knox, M. N. Locke, and O. P. Grant patrol the boundaries of the reserve and engage with indigenous tribes for insights. TRIBAL LIAISON: Lieutenant Q. R. Pierce works closely with tribal leaders to gather information and ensure their rights and lands are protected. ADDITIONAL DETAILS:  Environmental activists have planned a rally to protest the logging activities and demand stricter regulations.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Captain A. D. Watson  
Officer Context: Captain Watson is the lead officer overseeing the protection and investigation of the national forest.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Detective B. E. Quinn  
Officer Context: Detective Quinn is in charge of drone surveillance to monitor and capture evidence of illegal logging.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective C. F. Schultz  
Officer Context: Detective Schultz assists in drone operations to keep track of logging activities.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective G. H. Torres  
Officer Context: Detective Torres scrutinizes purchase records to link heavy machinery with suspected logging firms.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective I. J. Vega  
Officer Context: Detective Vega aids in understanding the links between the machinery and the companies involved.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officers K. L. Knox, M. N. Locke, and O. P. Grant  
Officer Context: These officers regularly patrol the forest reserve and connect with indigenous communities for information.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officers 

Officer Name: Lieutenant Q. R. Pierce  
Officer Context: Lieutenant Pierce liaises with tribal leaders, ensuring their lands and rights are respected during the investigation.  
Officer Role: Lieutenant
